head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOODWIN, FRANK, ''UNCLE FRANK''

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOODWIN, FRANK, ''UNCLE FRANK''

block.p: GOODWIN--Frank, ''Uncle Frank'', On April 23, 2007. Beloved son of the late Peter and Helen Goodwin. Loving brother of Bob and Dick Goodwin. Fond uncle of Ellen and Richard Goodwin and many other nieces, nephews; also grandnieces, grandnephews, and Godfather of 7. Family will receive friends on Wednesday, 79pm, and Thursday, 2-5 and 79 at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 St. Mass of Christian Burial Friday, 10am, at St. John the Evangelist R.C. Church, First Ave at 55 St. Interment to follow at Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury, New York.

GOODWIN--Frank, ''Uncle Frank'', On April 23, 2007. Beloved son of the late Peter and Helen Goodwin. Loving brother of Bob and Dick Goodwin. Fond uncle of Ellen and Richard Goodwin and many other nieces, nephews; also grandnieces, grandnephews, and Godfather of 7. Family will receive friends on Wednesday, 79pm, and Thursday, 2-5 and 79 at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 St. Mass of Christian Burial Friday, 10am, at St. John the Evangelist R.C. Church, First Ave at 55 St. Interment to follow at Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury, New York.
